sentences.en: All the boys burst out into a guffaw at the joke.
sentences.cn: 听到这个笑话,男孩子们发出一声狂笑.

sentences.en: He bursts into a loud guffaw.
He is complacent very on the street guffaw is strolling.
sentences.cn: 他很是自得的在街上狂笑漫步着.

sentences.en: He laughed, a coarse hearty guffaw.
sentences.cn: 他哈哈笑了起来,一阵粗率 、 热诚的大笑.

sentences.en: Make us guffaw at thy futile follies.
sentences.cn: 你的愚行让我们粗声大笑.

sentences.en: My guffaw tongue - lashes: Fool, you look in a few buildings.
sentences.cn: 我狂笑大骂: 笨蛋, 你在几楼看的.

sentences.en: Sorry, but that's one thing I cannot do!'he quipped, bursting into a guffaw.
sentences.cn: “对不起, 但那是我不会做的事之一! ” 他嘲讽地说, 引发一阵大笑.

sentences.en: We guffawed at what Graham had written.
sentences.cn: 我们对格雷厄姆写的东西狂笑不已。

trans.tran_en: A guffaw is a very loud laugh
